events.name: Newcastle United at West Ham United

headlines.description: Newcastle United continued their bid for Premier League survival with a 1-1 draw away to West Ham United at the London Stadium on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Newcastle revival continues with draw at West Ham

headlines.description: Arsenal returned to winning ways at the Emirates with a comfortable 2-0 victory against Brentford.
headlines.shortLinkText: Smith Rowe, Saka fire Arsenal to Brentford win

headlines.description: Emmanuel Dennis scored 12 minutes from time to hand struggling Watford vital away points as they won 1-0 away at Aston Villa in the Premier League.
headlines.shortLinkText: Dennis scores late as Watford clinch first win since November

headlines.description: Burnley claimed only their second Premier League win of the season in a 3-0 demolition of Brighton & Hove Albion on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Weghorst on form as Burnley thrash Brighton

headlines.description: Hakim Ziyech scored a late goal to give Chelsea a 1-0 win against Crystal Palace in their first Premier League game since the end of January.
headlines.shortLinkText: Late Ziyech goal gives Chelsea victory at Palace

headlines.description: Liverpool came from behind to claim a 3-1 victory against relegation-battlers Norwich City at Anfield on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Salah, Mane score as Liverpool edge Norwich

headlines.description: Stuart Armstrong and substitute Shane Long scored for Southampton as they punished error-prone Everton to claim a deserved 2-0 victory.
headlines.shortLinkText: Southampton punish sloppy Everton to claim 2-0 win

headlines.description: Harry Kane scored a late winner as Tottenham Hotspur ended their dismal Premier League form with a 3-2 away win over Manchester City on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Kane nets late winner as Spurs edge Man City
